price: Hakika Sisi tutairithi ardhi na walio juu yake. Na kwetu watarejeshwa.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
